actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure, and in addition to the Committees on Ways and Means, and Energy and Commerce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

official_title: To establish a Water Infrastructure Trust Fund, and for other purposes.
short_title: Water Infrastructure Trust Fund Act of 2019

summary.text:
Water Infrastructure Trust Fund Act of 2019 

The bill establishes a Water Infrastructure Trust Fund for the Environmental Protection Agency to use for capitalization grants under the clean water state revolving fund or drinking water state revolving fund.

titles.title: Water Infrastructure Trust Fund Act of 2019
